name: Staybridge Suites Houston / NASA - Clear Lake

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My original review was written right after our first stay here. Since that time, we've stayed another 4 or 5 times. All the (few) issues I had in my original review have been resolved, so I'm happy to update my review to the full five stars. This location is extremely convenient for us, whether we fly or drive. There are great shopping & dining options close by. The rooms are very comfortable, especially the one bedroom suite, which is really a nice, small apartment. Service at this facility is just over the top--we will be back again soon. A special thank you to Jessica & Blake.
reviews.title: Home away from home.

reviews.text: I had the the opportunity to stay here with outstanding accomodations...The entire staff was superb, and I would certainly recommend anyone in the area to spend some time there!!!
reviews.title: Outstanding

reviews.text: Great food and comfortable living arrangement. The rates were very reasonable too.
reviews.title: I would and will come back!

reviews.text: Thanks
reviews.title: Excellent Choice.

reviews.text: Michael
reviews.title: Was beyond impressed!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Average mid-chain hotel that serves a purpose.
reviews.title: Not bad - very noisy hotel

reviews.text: The "junior suite" was ok - mostly clean and well looked after/furnished - dark colours used throughout. Very noisy air conditioning. The bed sheets looked crumpled and I wasn't exactly sure at first that they had been changed from the previous occupant - it was that hard to tell.
reviews.title: Staybridge Suites is my favorite hotel chain....

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Shower pressure was truly pathetic on the fourth floor - this really needs sorting out. Internet speed was slow too.
reviews.title: Great value

reviews.text: Breakfast area is quite small for a large hotel and unless you get there early at the weekend, you have to sit at the large tables with lots of other people - so if you like a peaceful quiet start to the day, get up early! Food was OK - I had some eggs one morning and they were hot and not overcooked. Juice was more like orange squash - definitely not freshly squeezed OJ.
reviews.title: Worth the

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Do not rely on your sat nav for this hotel address - you'll end up a mile away (known problem). Better to look it up on google maps and sort our your own directions.
reviews.title: Great place to stay!

reviews.text: We spent Labor Day weekend at this hotel. The location was perfect for our trip to the Houston Space Center. The room provided ample space for our family of 4. Clean,spacios rooms with very confy beds! Bathrooms a great size. Hotel pool and hot tub area was amazing! Two grills on site for those who chose to barbecue. Hot breakfast each morning with great coffee! Whenever in the area again, we will definitely stay at this Staybridge!!!
reviews.title: Great hotel and accommodations for our family of 4!
Poor housekeeping-hairs on sheets
reviews.text: Im sad to say that this hotel did not meet our expectations as given from the previous reviews. We chose this hotel based on the great tripadvisor reviews. We have 2 kids so every time I check in to a hotel, the first thing I do is check for safety and cleanliness of the hotel room. After pulling back the sheets to make sure they were clean before putting the kids down for a nap, I saw multiple hairs, not lint, but what looked like pubic hairs! I was absolutely disgusted! Hotel staff did come fairly quickly and change our sheets. But after she left, I noticed that on the floor where she had put the dirty sheets the hairs from the sheets and now toenail clippings were present! Gross! My husband asked the front desk if they would come vacuum and mop our floors while we were at dinner where the front desk attendant asked "can it wait till tomorrow?" who wants their children to walk and/ or crawl around a strangers pubic hairs/toenail clippings?! While we were gone they did vacuum the carpet area but we noticed on the bathroom floor one of the same pubic hairs was still there in the doorway so we knew they did not mop the floors. We gave them the opportunity to fix the problem and they were unsuccessful at doing so. The housekeeping also didn't leave the same number of towels they took from the room. We were left having to use our bathroom towels for dish towels for a place to dry our dishes.

We can tell that the hotel does try to be nice as it has a nice pool area, movie theater room, breakfast and serves dinner tues-thurs but the poor housekeeping stands out. If the housekeeping were to improve tremendously then we might consider staying here again.
reviews.title: A home away from home

reviews.text: We enjoyed the spacious one bedroom suite during our stay at the Staybridge Suites a few weeks ago. It was nice to have two TV sets so that my son and I could both watch our favorite TV shows in the evening. We really enjoyed the free breakfast each morning, especially the Texas-shaped waffles. The hotel has a lovely pool and hot tub area. One evening other guests took advantage of the bbq area. The staff was very friendly and accomodating, helping out with our TV remote and providing more towels outside. I definitely recommend this hotel and hope to stay here and at other Staybridge Suites properties in the future.
reviews.title: Awesome hospitality clean and very comfortable!

reviews.text: The staff is wonderful! They made us feel right at home. The breakfast was never the same items and the food was fresh each morning. Tuesday thru Thursday they served dinner as well. (At no additional cost) I highly recommend this hotel.
reviews.title: Tourist apartments

reviews.text: It was better then the Country inn suites that we payed to much money to stay in(the breakfast was bad& everything was broke, Galveston). Next time I will just take a extra ride to get to the beach. The place to be was Staybridge (great breakfast, front desk people where good &free washer and dryer's) excellent stay. .
reviews.title: Home away from home:-)

reviews.text: My stay here has been an excellent experience. The room is very clean, comfortable, and quiet. The hotel staff is the most friendly staff I have ever encountered. The complimentary breakfast had a nice variety and very tasty. The free dinner tues. night - thurs. night was good as well. All around excellent stay and I will definitely be back. I will recommend this hotel to anyone staying in his area.
reviews.title: Excellent stay!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We really enjoyed our stay at the Staybridge Suites. Staybridge Suite was up to date, clean and comfortable. The staff was friendly and very helpful with directions, recommendations and anything else we needed. Our room was clean and comfortable. Bedding and bed provided a very comfortable nights sleep. The room was quiet. The Suite is in a very convenient area to see the sights South East of Houston. It is just off I-45. We enjoyed a day at Space Center Houston NASA and another day on Galveston Island. Very easy access to both. The hotel has a saltwater pool with a waterfall and hot tub. It was so relaxing. My husband enjoyed the putting green. The homemade cookies were a wonderful treat. The complimentary breakfast was SO good! All in all it felt like a home away from home. We really enjoyed the Staybridge Suites Houston / NASA and would highly recommend it to anyone.
reviews.title: Home away from home.

reviews.text: Hotel is in a very good area plenty of shop within a few minuets drive. Lots of local restaurants with in walking distanance we tried BJs in is a sports bar with micro brewery real ales good along with the food. Hotel was very clean room had all you would need to prepear a meal. Rooms had a fridge freezer dishwaher ect you even have washing up liquid and dishwasher tabs. Staff where very helpful. Pool and barby area very nice got busier when the sun was of the pool. Overall we had a good 3 days and would recommened this hotel.One point A/C units are in room and are a bit nosiey.
reviews.title: our vacation

reviews.text: This hotel was more than you could want for the price. Really clean, large rooms, great staff that was professional and even more impressive was that they were really nice!! Highly recommend! Oh, and the dinner and evening drinks are a total bonus! Stay here and you will not be disapointed. Can't say enough nice things about this hotel.
reviews.title: Amazing place

aka: Staybridge Suites Houston / Nasa - Clear Lake Hotel
description: Welcome to the Staybridge Suites Houston/NASA Clear Lake! Your large, upscale suite awaits with a fully-furnished kitchen, luxurious Plush Paradise beds, and LCD TV with HDTV. Start your day off with a delicious and hot complimentary breakfast and end it relaxing at the Just Like Home Theater or putting green! For the active traveler, jumpstart your day at our club level fitness center and end it relaxing in our saltwater resort pool/hot tub!
